function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Restriction of physical activity for children and adolescents due to COVID-19 measures","Impact":"Decline in physical activity leading to increased inactivity and sedentary behavior","Mitigation":"Encouraging and facilitating safe physical activity through alternative means such as at-home exercise and outdoor activities","Technologies":"Virtual group activities, video-based exercise programs","People":"Children, adolescents, families","Owner":"Government, educational institutions, parents"},{"Description":"Decrease in physical activities and increase in other sedentary activities during the pandemic","Impact":"Reduced engagement in physical exercise and potential negative impact on mental health","Mitigation":"Promoting a balance of physical and non-physical activities, providing resources for at-home exercise","Technologies":"Online mental health support, virtual exercise programs","People":"General population","Owner":"Health organizations, community groups, individuals"},{"Description":"Potential positive effect of physical activity on mental health during a global pandemic","Impact":"Improvement of mental health through regular physical activity","Mitigation":"Encouraging and supporting indoor physical exercise, conducting research on the relationship between physical activity and mental health","Technologies":"Virtual exercise classes, mental health tracking apps","People":"General population","Owner":"Health organizations, researchers"}]}
